Html:
A bibliography usually looks like

 

Deleuze, Gilles: "Book Name", etc.

Entries by the same author will follow as

-. "Book Name"

BibWord produces a redundancy by repeating the author's name for every entry.

Event the word citation styles (take any of them) do it properly.

The question is: How can I change the BibWord style to provide this functionallity.

It would also be nice, if one could format the symbol in front of the next row (-.)

Otherwise I really enjoy working with the BibWord framework! Great work!

BibWord does not support this. It is one of the sacrifices I had to make in order to keep the formatting simple. It is one of the things I'm looking into for a next version though. But that version will probably only appear around the time Word 2010 gets released.
Sounds good. I am looking forward to this feature in the next version. Cheers, A.
